text: Vladimir Mikhailovich Bochkov (; 1 July 1946 â€“ 31 March 2022) was a Russian politician. He was a member of United Russia. He was in the Federation Council from 2013 to 2018. Bochkov was born in Ivanovo, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. Bochkov died on 31 March 2022, at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia) Category:People from Ivanovo Oblast
title: Vladimir Bochkov
